entry.title: Classik - Concentrated Bleach 6% - 5 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Classik
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.49

  • Clean and deodorize with the power of Clorox Bleach concentrated formula.
  • For use in HE and standard washing machines.
  • Eliminates up to 99.9 percent of household dirt and grime.
  • Perfect for cleaning around your home or office. Easy to grip handle prevents spills.
  • Keeping your work place safe and germ-free is critically important, so bleach is perfect for even the toughest applications! This bleach has been proven to kill 50+ specific germs, including MRSA, staph, strep, athlete's foot, C. difficile, influenza, and other infectious pathogens. While the value of keeping your staff and your guests safe from catching or transmitting diseases speaks for itself, Pure Bright bleach also offers significant cost savings over other national brands.

    In janitorial applications, this bleach is ideal for disinfecting and deodorizing nonporous surfaces such as floors, walls, work surfaces, and restroom fixtures. Simply dilute with water to create an effective disinfecting solution! It is perfect for use in healthcare facilities, offices, schools, nursing homes, day-cares, or hotels. Plus, this versatile bleach has a number of uses in a variety of food service applications. For instance, it can be used to sanitize and deodorize nonporous food-contact surfaces such as dishes, utensils, and restaurant equipment as well as porous surfaces such as cutting boards and butcher blocks.

    In addition to janitorial and food service applications, bleach offers an effective and economical way to clean fabrics and clothes. Dilute with water to create the perfect sanitizing and stain-removing solution for all of your commercial laundry needs.

entry.title: Sprakita - Defoamer Anti Foam Silicone Emulsion - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sprakita
Type: Disposables
Price: 14.99

Sprakita - Defoamer Anti Foam Silicone Emulsion - 4 L

A water soluble silicone oil developed to immediately disapate foam & stop lather from foaming.

Can be used in all steam cleaning & extraction systems. Very potent & only takes a few drops to work effectively.

Add 1/2 oz to 1 gallon steam cleaning liquid or to the water in return tank, whichever is more suited to your operation.

Type: Disposables
Price: 18.99

Sprakita - Metallox Supreme Floor Finish - 4 L

A metal linked acrylic floor finish    *** HIGH GLOSS - DETERGENT RESISTANT ***

 WILL NOT DISCOLORE LIGHT FLOORS

Scuff resistant, non-powedering, water resistant, buffalo, anti-slip, durable, colourless finish that dries to a brilliant high gloss without buffing.

entry.title: GK - Rapid Strip Floor Finish & Emulsion Sealer & Stripper - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: GK Chemical
Type: Disposables
Price: 18.99

GK Chemicals - Rapid Strip Floor Finish & Emulsion Sealer & Stripper - 4 L

GENERAL:

RAPID-STRIP is an odourless stripper composed of a complex of cleaning
materials and surface-active agents specially formulated to quickly and easily remove floor finish,
wax and emulsion seal build-up from floors WITH or WITHOUT the aid of a scrubbing machine or
pads. This fast-acting, efficient, labour and time-saving product allows pick-up of emulsified
finish and seal with mops, squeegee and wet vacuum, or automatic machine. With RAPID -STRIP,
no scrubbing is necessary.
DIRECTION:

Dilute according to finish and seal build-up;
- For LIGHT BUILD-UP, dilute 1 part RAPID-STRIP to 4 parts lukewarm water.
- For MEDIUM BUILD-UP, dilute 1 part RAPID-STRIP to 2 parts lukewarm water.
- For HEAVY BUILD-UP, dilute 1 part RAPID-STRIP to 1 part lukewarm water.
- For AUTOMATIC MACHINE, dilute 1 part RAPID-STRIP to 4 parts lukewarm water.
Liberally apply selected stripping solution to floor surface and allow to work for three to five
minutes, making sure the floor remains wet. Remop to provide agitation then pick-up emulsified
finish and/or seal. Thoroughly rinse the stripped area with clean water and allow to dry before
application of sealer and/or floor finish. AVOID CONTACT WITH PAINTED SURFACES.
PRECAUTIONS: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. Do NOT take internally. Avoid
contact
with eyes. FIRST AID: If swallowed, immediately drink large quantities of milk or water. Induce
vomiting by tickling throat with forefinger or by drinking lukewarm salted water. GET MEDICAL
ATTENTION. In case of contact with eyes, immediately flush with plenty of water for at least fifteen
minutes. GET MEDICAL ATTENTION.
SPECIFICATIONS
- COLOUR: Fluorescent green
- PH: 11.35 ± 0.2
- PHOSPHATES: None
- CHLORINATED SOLVENTS: None
- AROMATIC HYDROCARBONS: None
- ALIPHATIC HYDROCARBONS: None
- VISCOSITY AT 250
C: 1-5 CPS (Brookfield)
- STABILITY: Mnimum one year between 70 C & 380 C
- SPECIFIC GRAVITY: O.98 ± 0.15 gms/cm3
- % TOTAL ACTIVE INREDIENTS: 67.1 ± 1.0
- BIODEGRADABILITY: Complete

entry.title: Sprakita - Fast Strip Energized Stripper - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sprakita
Type: Disposables
Price: 12.99

Sprakita - Fast Strip Energized Stripper - 4 L

To strip floors coated with acrylic sealers and finishes. Formulated to quickly remove finishes with minimum effort & mechanical aid.

DIRECTIONS: Dilute 1 part concentrate to 4 parts of hot water. Depending on the condition of the floor, discretion of the user is necessary.

Product can be diluted 1 part to 6 parts water. To ensure full coverage apply liberally with a mop. Let sit for approximately 5-10 minutes

until finish has been softened & is loose. Do not allow to dry. Remove with mop using agitated motion. More then one application may be

necessary depending on the condition of floor. Rinse with cold water.

entry.title: Diversey - Wiwax Cleaning & Maintenance Emulsion - 4 x 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diversey
Type: Disposables
Price: 167.99

A unique blend of detergents, waxes and polymers. Ideal cleaner/maintainer for PVC, rubber, linoleum, asphalt, marble, slate, concrete, quarry tile or terrazzo flooring. Cleans, shines and protects when used on a regular basis. Will not yellow. White in color with an ammonia scent.

  • A unique blend of waxes, polymers and detergents to effectively clean and maintain rubber as well as linoleum, asphalt, marble and slate flooring
  • An integral part of a comprehensive floor care program for cleaning, stripping, and sealing rubber floors
  • Ideal cleaner and maintainer - cleans and shines
  • Protects when used on regular basis
  • Pleasant fragrance

entry.title: Diversey - Cleaner & Restorer Spray Buff CBD540458 - 4 x 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diversey
Type: Disposables
Price: 66.99

Floor Science® Cleaner & Restorer Spray Buff keeps your floors looking their best at all times. Delivering state-of-the-art performance and cost efficiency. Diversey® has been making floor care simple for more than 100 years, no wonder professionals trust Floor Science. Use the complete Floor Science system to create and maintain a consistently brilliant shine on floors with minimal time and effort. We make it simple. You make it beautiful.

  • Leaves floor with a brilliant, durable shine when used regularly
  • Cleans, shines and removes black heel marks, surface scratches, tar and ingrained dirt
  • Helps maintain a continuous “wet look" without finish build-up or discoloration
  • Combines solvents, emulsifiers, a hard wax and a special polymer to produce a smooth, deep gloss—even on worn floor finishes
  • One gallon covers up to 30,000 sq. ft. (2,787 sq. m)

Diversey - Floor Science -Cleaner & Restorer Spray Buff CBD540458 - 4 x 3.78 L

entry.summary:
Vendor: Diversey
Type: Disposables
Price: 31.99

Floor Science® Premium High Gloss Floor Finish is an easy-to-apply floor finish/sealer that is formulated to work with any maintenance method and equipment. Delivering state-of-the-art performance and cost efficiency. Diversey® has been making floor care simple for more than 100 years, no wonder professionals trust Floor Science. Use the complete Floor Science system to create and maintain a consistently brilliant shine on floors with minimal time and effort. We make it simple. You make it beautiful.

  • Solids Content 20%
  • Synthetic polymeric floor finish creates initial high-gloss without buffing or burnishing
  • Works with non-buff, dry buff and spray buff programs. Responds to 175 through 2000 equipment
  • The “built-in" sealer means the finish acts as its own sealer—no separate product required
  • Meets ASTM D-2047 slip resistance requirements
  • One gallon covers up to 2,500 sq. ft. (232 sq. m)

entry.title: Drano - Professional Strength Kitchen Crystals & Drain Cleaner - 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Drano
Type: Disposables
Price: 11.99

Drano Full Clog Destroyer is a powerful drain cleaner that is specially formulated to take on the toughest clogs. The thick gel holds together to cut through standing water and attack built-up hair, gunk and soap scum. It gets to work fast, eliminating stubborn blockages and leaving your drain free-flowing and clog-free. Full Clog Destroyer is safe for all septic systems and pipes, including PVC, plastic, copper and old pipes. Keep your drains clear with Liquid-Plumr.

  1. Professional drain cleaner
  1. Clears stubborn fully blocked drains
  1. Special thick gel wont dilute as it cuts through the toughest clogs
  1. Safe for all pipes, including PVC, plastic, copper, old pipes and septic systems
  1. Saves time and money by empowering you to clear drains yourself
